body:
Ok with Xcode 7 beta 4. In a test project in Xcode, I set an applie ID identity to use, but did not assign a provisioning profile.

so when i rerun the golang build for ios i get:

omobile build -target=ios golang.org/x/mobile/example/basic
gomobile: xcrun xcodebuild -configuration Release -project /var/folders/wp/ff6sz9qs6g71jnm12nj2kbyw0000gp/T/gomobile-work-112842632/main.xcodeproj failed: exit status 65
=== BUILD TARGET main OF PROJECT main WITH CONFIGURATION Release ===

Check dependencies
Code Sign error: No provisioning profiles found: No nonâ€“expired provisioning profiles were found.
CodeSign error: code signing is required for product type 'Application' in SDK 'iOS 8.4'

** BUILD FAILED **


The following build commands failed:
	Check dependencies
(1 failure)


---

This is to be expected, and i just need to plug in an iphone and it will work..
